tool_description: Fetching the best gaming gears, keyboards, mice and headsets according to several websites such as Pc Gamer and Tom's Guide.
name: Gaming Gear
title: Gaming Gear

api_list.name: Get all the best headphones
api_list.description: Get all the best headphones from various websites
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gaming-gear.p.rapidapi.com/headphones"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gaming-gear.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
